IRS990.MissionDesc: TO BENEFIT JAMESTOWN COMMUNITY COLLEGE IN CARRYING OUT ITS EDUCATIONAL, SCIENTIFIC, CAPITAL AND CULTURAL PROGRAMS.
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDED RESOURCES TO JAMESTOWN COMMUNITY COLLEGE IN CARRYING OUT ITS EDUCATIONAL, SCIENTIFIC, AND CULTURAL PROGRAMS, INCLUDING SCHOLARSHIPS FOR STUDENTS AND CAPITAL EXPENDITURES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: OTHER EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS THAT BENEFIT THE STUDENTS OF JAMESTOWN COMMUNITY COLLEGE VIA SCHOLARSHIPS AND PROGRAM DISBURSEMENTS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: SPECIAL PURPOSES FUND TO PROVIDE RESOURCES TO BENEFIT THE PROGRAMS OF JAMESTOWN COMMUNITY COLLEGE.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990 SCHEDULE A,PART IV,SECTION E LINE 2A
Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: THE EXCLUSIVE PURPOSE OF THE FOUNDATION IS TO SUPPORT THE CHARITABLE, RELIGIOUS, SCIENTIFIC, AND EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES OF JAMESTOWN COMMUNITY COLLEGE. DURING THE YEAR ENDED AUGUST 31, 2023, THE FOUNDATION PROVIDED STUDENT SCHOLARSHIPS, RELATED PROGRAM DISBURSEMENTS AND PROGRAM DEVELOPENT FUNDING TOTALING $1,350,561 TO JAMESTOWN COMMUNITY COLLEGE. STUDENT SCHOLARSHIPS TOTALED $511,966; RELATED PROGRAM DISBURSEMENTS TOTALED $829,195; AND PROGRAM DEVELOPMENT FUNDING TOTALED $9,400. ALL DISBURSEMENTS WERE FOR THE DIRECT FURTHERANCE OF THE ACTIVITIES OF JAMESTOWN COMMUNITY COLLEGE AND ITS STUDENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ENDOWMNENT NET ASSETS WILL BE UTILIZED TO BENEFIT THE EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS AND CAPITAL PROJECTS OF JAMESTOWN COMMUNITY COLLEGE.

THE FOUNDATION'S FORM 990, RETURN OF ORGANIZATION EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAX, FOR THE YEARS ENDED AUGUST 31, 2023, 2022, AND 2021 ARE SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE, GENERALLY FOR THREE YEARS AFTER THEY WERE FILED.

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: STUDENT SCHOLARSHIPS $511,966; PROGRAM DISBURSEMENTS $829,195; BUSINESS PLAN FOR STADIUM DEVELOPMENT $9,400.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SCHOLARSHIPS AND OTHER FINANCIAL AID TO STUDENTS THAT MEET THE CRITERIA AND RESTRICTIONS SET FORTH BY THE DONOR ARE MONITORED BY THE FINANCIAL AID OFFICE OF JAMESTOWN COMMUNITY COLLEGE. OTHER PROGRAM DISBURSEMENTS MADE TO JAMESTOWN COMMUNITY COLLEGE ARE APPROVED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF THE FOUNDATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION'S BOARD OF DIRECTORS FORMALLY AUTHORIZED THE AUDIT COMMITTEE TO REVIEW THE FORM 990 AND RELATED SCHEDULES WITH THE CPA THAT PREPARED THE FORM AND TO APPROVE FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: POTENTIAL CONFLICTS ARE IDENTIFIED AND COMMUNICATED TO MANAGEMENT. THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND MANAGEMENT MONITORS AND REVIEWS THESE POTENTIAL CONFLICTS ON A REGULAR BASIS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SALARIES AND FRINGE BENEFITS ARE PAID BY JAMESTOWN COMMUNITY COLLEGE AND ARE ALLOCATED TO THE FOUNDATION BASED UPON EMPLOYEE TIME COMMITTMENTS TO THE FOUNDATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.

THE FOUNDATION MAINTAINS AN AUDIT COMMITTEE THAT ASSUMES RESPONSIBILITY FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE ANNUAL AUDIT OF ITS FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND THE SELECTION OF THE INDEPENDENT AUDITOR. THE OVERSIGHT PROCESS AND SELECTION OF THE INDEPENDENT AUDITOR DID NOT CHANGE DURING THE CURRENT YEAR.
